text: kavara visayaka api numbalata pahasukam laba nodunnemu da evan dæhi sæbævinma api ovunata pahasukam laba dunimu. tavada api ovunata savan, bælma ha hadavat da æti kalemu. namut allahge vadan ovun pratiksepa karamin siti bævin ovunge savan ho ovunge bælma ho ovunge hadavat kisivakin ho ovunata phalak noviya. tavada ovun kavara deyak pilibanda samaccal karamin sitiye da eya ovun vatakaragatteya
